SwitchMetrics.description: The SwitchMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a switch device.
SwitchMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the metrics for a switch device in a Redfish implementation.

title: #SwitchMetrics.SwitchMetrics
